text: [Ej pajomʙar, ʙa muşrikon] Bigū: «Parvardigoram ʙa adolat farmon dodaast va [inki hama ço, ʙa viƶa] dar har masçide [xolisona] rūji xeşro ʙa sūji [qiʙlai] Ū kuned va Ūro dar holi [ʙa duo va nijoiş] ʙixoned ki din [-i xud]-ro ʙarojaş xolis namudaed. [Va ʙidoned] Hamon guna ki şumoro dar oƣoz padid ovard, [pas az marg niz ʙori digar ʙa sūjaş] ʙozmegarded
